name: OontZ Angle 3 Portable Bluetooth 5.4 Speaker
pros: Surprisingly loud and clear sound for its size
cons: IPX5 rating is only water-resistant, not fully waterproof
Bass is limited due to small size
Charging time is relatively long (4 hours)
description: The OontZ Angle 3 is a budget-friendly portable Bluetooth speaker featuring Bluetooth 5.4 technology with an impressive 100ft wireless range, 12W output power, and 24-hour battery life. With its IPX5 water-resistant design, compact size (5.3 inches), and lightweight construction (10 ounces), it's perfect for travel, outdoor activities, and home use. Designed and engineered by Cambridge Sound Works in the USA.
